And<S>2532</S> he shewed<S>1166</S> me<S>3427</S> a pure<S>2513</S> river<S>4215</S> of water<S>5204</S> of life<S>2222</S>, clear<S>2986</S> as<S>5613</S> crystal<S>2930</S>, proceeding<S>1607</S> out of<S>1537</S> the throne<S>2362</S> of God<S>2316</S> and<S>2532</S> of the Lamb<S>721</S>.
In<S>1722</S> the midst<S>3319</S> of the street<S>4113</S> of it<S>846</S>, and<S>2532</S> on either<S>2532</S> side<S>1782</S> <S>1782</S> of the river<S>4215</S>, was there the tree<S>3586</S> of life<S>2222</S>, which bare<S>4160</S> twelve<S>1427</S> manner of fruits<S>2590</S>, and yielded<S>591</S> her<S>846</S> fruit<S>2590</S> every<S>2596</S> <S>1538</S> <S>1520</S> month<S>3376</S>: and<S>2532</S> the leaves<S>5444</S> of the tree<S>3586</S> were for<S>1519</S> the healing<S>2322</S> of the nations<S>1484</S>.
And<S>2532</S> there shall be<S>2071</S> no<S>3756</S> more<S>2089</S> <S>3956</S> curse<S>2652</S>: but<S>2532</S> the throne<S>2362</S> of God<S>2316</S> and<S>2532</S> of the Lamb<S>721</S> shall be<S>2071</S> in<S>1722</S> it<S>846</S>; and<S>2532</S> his<S>846</S> servants<S>1401</S> shall serve<S>3000</S> him<S>846</S>:
And<S>2532</S> they shall see<S>3700</S> his<S>846</S> face<S>4383</S>; and<S>2532</S> his<S>846</S> name<S>3686</S> shall be in<S>1909</S> their<S>846</S> foreheads<S>3359</S>.
And<S>2532</S> there shall be<S>2071</S> no<S>3756</S> night<S>3571</S> there<S>1563</S>; and<S>2532</S> they need<S>5532</S> no<S>3756</S> candle<S>3088</S> <S>2192</S>, neither<S>2532</S> light<S>5457</S> of the sun<S>2246</S>; for<S>3754</S> the Lord<S>2962</S> God<S>2316</S> giveth<S>5461</S> them<S>846</S> light<S>5461</S>: and<S>2532</S> they shall reign<S>936</S> for<S>1519</S> ever<S>165</S> and ever<S>165</S>.
And<S>2532</S> he said<S>2036</S> unto me<S>3427</S>, These<S>3778</S> sayings<S>3056</S> are faithful<S>4103</S> and<S>2532</S> true<S>228</S>: and<S>2532</S> the Lord<S>2962</S> God<S>2316</S> of the holy<S>40</S> prophets<S>4396</S> sent<S>649</S> his<S>846</S> angel<S>32</S> to shew<S>1166</S> unto his<S>846</S> servants<S>1401</S> the things which<S>3739</S> must<S>1163</S> shortly<S>1722</S> <S>5034</S> be done<S>1096</S>.
Behold<S>2400</S>, I come<S>2064</S> quickly<S>5035</S>: blessed<S>3107</S> is he that keepeth<S>5083</S> the sayings<S>3056</S> of the prophecy<S>4394</S> of this<S>5127</S> book<S>975</S>.
And<S>2532</S> I<S>1473</S> John<S>2491</S> saw<S>991</S> these things<S>5023</S>, and<S>2532</S> heard<S>191</S> them. And<S>2532</S> when<S>3753</S> I had heard<S>191</S> and<S>2532</S> seen<S>991</S>, I fell down<S>4098</S> to worship<S>4352</S> before<S>1715</S> the feet<S>4228</S> of the angel<S>32</S> which<S>3588</S> shewed<S>1166</S> me<S>3427</S> these things<S>5023</S>.
Then<S>2532</S> saith he<S>3004</S> unto me<S>3427</S>, See<S>3708</S> thou do it not<S>3361</S>: for<S>1063</S> I am<S>1510</S> thy<S>4675</S> fellowservant<S>4889</S>, and<S>2532</S> of thy<S>4675</S> brethren<S>80</S> the prophets<S>4396</S>, and<S>2532</S> of them which keep<S>5083</S> the sayings<S>3056</S> of this<S>5127</S> book<S>975</S>: worship<S>4352</S> God<S>2316</S>.
And<S>2532</S> he saith<S>3004</S> unto me<S>3427</S>, Seal<S>4972</S> not<S>3361</S> the sayings<S>3056</S> of the prophecy<S>4394</S> of this<S>5127</S> book<S>975</S>: for<S>3754</S> the time<S>2540</S> is<S>2076</S> at hand<S>1451</S>.
He that is unjust<S>91</S>, let him be unjust<S>91</S> still<S>2089</S>: and<S>2532</S> he which is filthy<S>4510</S>, let him be filthy<S>4510</S> still<S>2089</S>: and<S>2532</S> he that is righteous<S>1342</S>, let him be righteous<S>1344</S> still<S>2089</S>: and<S>2532</S> he that is holy<S>40</S>, let him be holy<S>37</S> still<S>2089</S>.
And<S>2532</S>, behold<S>2400</S>, I come<S>2064</S> quickly<S>5035</S>; and<S>2532</S> my<S>3450</S> reward<S>3408</S> is with<S>3326</S> me<S>1700</S>, to give<S>591</S> every man<S>1538</S> according as<S>5613</S> his<S>846</S> work<S>2041</S> shall be<S>2071</S>.
I<S>1473</S> am<S>1510</S> Alpha<S>1</S> and<S>2532</S> Omega<S>5598</S>, the beginning<S>746</S> and<S>2532</S> the end<S>5056</S>, the first<S>4413</S> and<S>2532</S> the last<S>2078</S>.
Blessed<S>3107</S> are they that do<S>4160</S> his<S>846</S> commandments<S>1785</S>, that<S>2443</S> they<S>846</S> may have<S>2071</S> right<S>1849</S> to<S>1909</S> the tree<S>3586</S> of life<S>2222</S>, and<S>2532</S> may enter<S>1525</S> in through the gates<S>4440</S> into<S>1519</S> the city<S>4172</S>.
For<S>1161</S> without<S>1854</S> are dogs<S>2965</S>, and<S>2532</S> sorcerers<S>5333</S>, and<S>2532</S> whoremongers<S>4205</S>, and<S>2532</S> murderers<S>5406</S>, and<S>2532</S> idolaters<S>1496</S>, and<S>2532</S> whosoever<S>3956</S> loveth<S>5368</S> and<S>2532</S> maketh<S>4160</S> a lie<S>5579</S>.
I<S>1473</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> have sent<S>3992</S> mine<S>3450</S> angel<S>32</S> to testify<S>3140</S> unto you<S>5213</S> these things<S>5023</S> in<S>1909</S> the churches<S>1577</S>. I<S>1473</S> am<S>1510</S> the root<S>4491</S> and<S>2532</S> the offspring<S>1085</S> of David<S>1138</S>, and the bright<S>2986</S> and<S>2532</S> morning<S>3720</S> star<S>792</S>.
And<S>2532</S> the Spirit<S>4151</S> and<S>2532</S> the bride<S>3565</S> say<S>3004</S>, Come<S>2064</S>. And<S>2532</S> let him that heareth<S>191</S> say<S>2036</S>, Come<S>2064</S>. And<S>2532</S> let him that is athirst<S>1372</S> come<S>2064</S>. And<S>2532</S> whosoever will<S>2309</S>, let him take<S>2983</S> the water<S>5204</S> of life<S>2222</S> freely<S>1432</S>.
For<S>1063</S> I testify<S>4828</S> unto every man<S>3956</S> that heareth<S>191</S> the words<S>3056</S> of the prophecy<S>4394</S> of this<S>5127</S> book<S>975</S>, If<S>1437</S> any man<S>5100</S> shall add<S>2007</S> unto<S>4314</S> these things<S>5023</S>, God<S>2316</S> shall add<S>2007</S> unto<S>1909</S> him<S>846</S> the plagues<S>4127</S> that are written<S>1125</S> in<S>1722</S> this<S>5129</S> book<S>975</S>:
And<S>2532</S> if<S>1437</S> any man<S>5100</S> shall take away<S>851</S> from<S>575</S> the words<S>3056</S> of the book<S>976</S> of this<S>5129</S> prophecy<S>4394</S>, God<S>2316</S> shall take away<S>851</S> his<S>846</S> part<S>3313</S> out of<S>575</S> the book<S>976</S> of life<S>2222</S>, and<S>2532</S> out of<S>1537</S> the holy<S>40</S> city<S>4172</S>, and<S>2532</S> from the things which are written<S>1125</S> in<S>1722</S> this<S>5026</S> book<S>975</S>. <sup>out of the book: or, from the tree of life</sup>

The grace<S>5485</S> of our<S>2257</S> Lord<S>2962</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> Christ<S>5547</S> be with<S>3326</S> you<S>5216</S> all<S>3956</S>. Amen<S>281</S>.
